TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutoGeneratedField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField
Public NotInheritable Class AutoGeneratedField Inherits BoundField
public ref class AutoGeneratedField sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::BoundField

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中自动生成的字段。

span.span: Represents an automatically generated field in a data-bound control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示自动生成的字段在数据绑定控件中，如或。The class is used to represent an automatically generated field in a data-bound control, such as or . 自动生成的字段在适当的属性设置为时的数据绑定控件创建`true`(例如，属性控件，属性控件，依此类推）。Automatically generated fields are created by a data-bound control when the appropriate property is set to `true` (for example, the property for the control, the property for the control, and so on). > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的字段不会添加到的数据绑定控件的字段集合 (例如，集合控件，集合控件中，依次类推)。Automatically generated fields are not added to the field collection of a data-bound control (for example, the collection for the control, the collection for the control, and so on). 类旨在用于内部数据绑定控件。The class is intended for use internally by data-bound controls. 与其他数据字段 (如， ， ，依次类推)，则类不能放置以声明方式在页面上的字段集合的一部分。Unlike other data fields (such as , , , and so on), the class cannot be placed declaratively on a page as part of a field collection. 尽管您可以以编程方式添加对象传递给字段集合中，应当避免这种设计模式。Although you can programmatically add an object to a field collection, this design pattern should be avoided. 自动生成的字段表示字段自动呈现，因为数据绑定控件不通常允许用户修改的属性对象。Because automatically generated fields represent the automatic rendering of a field, data-bound controls do not typically allow users to modify the properties of the objects. 如果自动呈现不适合你的需求，定义自己的数据字段控件的字段集合。If the automatic rendering is not suitable for your needs, define your own data fields for the field collection of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义控件派生自对象控件。The following example demonstrates how to create an object for a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常由数据绑定控件 (如和) 时自动创建生成的字段。This constructor is generally used by data-bound controls (such as and ) when creating automatically generated fields. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建的新实例类实现派生自的自定义控件时控件。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class when implementing a custom control that derives from the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在从数据源检索字段值时，是否将空字符串 ("") 值转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are retrieved from the data source.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时字段的值为空字符串 ("") 数据源中。Sometimes a field's value is an empty string ("") in the data source. 属性用于指示是否将空字符串值转换为`null`之前显示在。The property is used to indicate whether empty string values are converted to `null` before being displayed in an . > [!NOTE] > 此版本的属性已实现始终返回`true`。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将特殊格式应用于中显示的值对象。The property is used to apply a special format to the values displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 已实现此版本的属性，以始终返回一个空字符串，以指示，尚无特殊格式设置将应用于字段值。This version of the property has been implemented to always return an empty string to indicate that no special formatting is applied to the field values. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象中显示的值的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values displayed in an object.

value.span: ，表示在 对象中显示的值的数据类型。

span.span: A that represents the data type of the value displayed in an object.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定中显示的值的数据类型对象。Use the property to specify the data type of the values displayed in an object. 数据类型确定哪种类型的控件呈现在对象显示的值。The data type determines what type of control is rendered in an object to display the value. 例如，复选框控件将显示当类型为。For example, a check box control is displayed when the type is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的字段值的数据类型时以编程方式创建中自定义控件派生自对象控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type of the field values when programmatically creating an object in a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象中的值填充指定的 对象。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于检索从指定的字段的值对象在对象。The method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in an object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 该方法没有返回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反，通过引用返回的字段值对象传入的`dictionary`参数。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 调用该方法后，循环访问对象来访问的字段值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 若要包括中的只读字段值对象，请传入`true`为`includeReadOnly`参数。To include the read-only field values in the object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象在插入模式中是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is visible in insert mode.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将记录插入该支持数据绑定控件 (如控件)，则属性用于指定是否在插入模式下的数据绑定控件时，将显示对象。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), the property is used to specify whether the object is displayed when the data-bound control is in insert mode. > [!NOTE] > 此版本的属性已实现始终返回`true`。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 确定 对象中所包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用来确定是否中包含的控件的帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is the helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 此方法已作为空方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调实现。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 派生自的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. 若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法不会引发异常;否则，抛出异常与描述为什么不支持回调的有用消息。To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
